title: Portable Windows System Tools DC 2016.07.31
description:
Portable Windows System Tools DC 2016.07.31

*** About this release

This collection includes the latest versions of the best Windows system tools.

All applications were virtualized using the latest version of VMWare Thinapp, which ensures they run on any Windows version (tested on Windows 10 64-bit).
VMWare ThinApp USB versions do not write files nor registry entries to the host computer.
Instead, they deploy all necessary data to a subfolder along the executable.

Automatic updates and internet connections were disabled whenever such options are made available in the program's option.
You should aways block any internet connection attempt with your firewall, except when required (see list below).

Applications are registered and/or patched, you will be able to run them from any location (folder, USB drive).
Some applications are system specific (32-bit/64-bit), others will run on both systems.

All files were scanned with ESET Smart Security (updated 2016.07.31)

Usage: unpack to a directory of your choice and launch your favourite application.
Size (unpacked): 645 MB

*** Included in this release

* System info
AIDA64 Extreme Edition 5.75.3900 (Finalware)
FolderSizes 8.2.137 Enterprise (Key Metric Software)

* System Security
HitmanPro 3.7.14 Build 265 (ALLOW INTERNET CONNECTION)

* System tweak
Ace Utilities 6.2.0.289
DLL Care 1.0.0.2258 (ALLOW INTERNET CONNECTION)
DLL Suite 9.0.0.2379 (ALLOW INTERNET CONNECTION)
Game Boost 3.8.1.2016 (make computer games run faster - PGWare)
Glary Utilities Pro 5.56.0.77
PCBoost 5.8.1.2016 (make your computer work faster - PGWare)
PCMedik 8.8.1.2016 (clean up the system - PGWare)
R-Wipe & Clean 11.4.2127
SuperRam 7.8.1.2016 (optimize the way your computer memory works - PGWare)
Throttle 8.8.1.2016 (accelerate your internet connection speed - PGWare)
WinUtilities Professional Edition 13.1
Wise Disk Cleaner 9.27
